title: Ordnance Factory Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 14 Graduate & Diploma Project Engineer Posts
description: The Ordnance Factory Dehu Road has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 14 Graduate & Diploma Project Engineer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the Ordnance Factory Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, ...
